strong.a: Harrison Community Schools Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

a.title: Go to comments for Harrison Community Schools Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

span.a: FOOD SERVICE MEALS DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE

hr.p: All Harrison Community School buildings are CLOSED for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. If you would like to reach the administration office please call 989-539-7871 to leave a message; we will get back with you as quickly as possible.

4/2/2020: With Governor Whitmer's Executive Order 2020-35, all K-12 school districts will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year for in-person instruction. Please continue to check our website, FaceBook, and emails from principals/teachers related to instruction. Schoolwork will begin the week of April 13th.
Please continue to check back for updates.
